title: Disk Forensics for Data Exfiltration
description: A forensics investigator must analyze a disk image from a compromised server to determine what data was stolen.

tasks.description: Create a forensic image (bit-for-bit copy) of the compromised server's hard drive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator successfully creates a valid disk image without altering the original evidence.

tasks.description: Analyze the file system timeline to identify files that were recently accessed or created by the attacker.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator identifies a suspicious ZIP file created just before the breach was detected.

tasks.description: Carve the suspicious ZIP file from the disk image and analyze its contents to determine the scope of the data exfiltration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Investigator recovers the ZIP file and confirms it contains sensitive customer data.
